gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 111, Grizzlies 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Grizzlies, 111-104. CJ McCollum leads New Orleans with 24 points, six assists, and four rebounds as Zion Williamson (23 points, seven rebounds) and Brandon Ingram (19 points, seven rebounds, six assists) combined for 42 points. Desmond Bane led the Grizzlies with 31 points, five rebounds, and five assists as Marcus Smart (17 points) and Xavier Tillman (17 points, 12 rebounds) totaled 34 points.
